about_the_game:
In this story, players will operate the white fluffy Pal on an adventure, and he will face new experimental tests and levels!

Thank you very much to our friends who supported us along the way!

We have prepared some new ideas, new gameplay, new art resources, and new surprises for this!
Of course, in order to create a sense of mystery, the DLC plot is a rumored plot of the game itself, but it is not the original series plot
Hope to bring you a better experience!


Also thank you for your support
